rules.payment: Payment: Please deposit the fee into the collection box at the meeting room before use.
rules.alcohol: Rules: Alcohol and smoking are prohibited in the meeting room. Exceptions for alcohol may be granted by the chairperson. Refer to the management bylaws for details.
rules.reservation_method: Reservation: Reservations via this website are required only for private use.

top.parkingTermsNote: - For guest parking regulations, please refer to "Rules & Regulations" on the notice board.
top.parkingRangeTooLong: The selected period exceeds the maximum allowed length. Please select a shorter period.
top.parkingRangeNotAvailable: No parking slot is available for the selected period. Please choose different dates.

confirm.heading: Reservation summary
confirm.executeNotice: We will create the reservation with the above details. Tap the "Confirm" button if this is correct.
confirm.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating the reservation. Please try again later.
confirm.completeBody: You can review your reservation from the Facility booking top page or My page.
